reviews.text:
It may well take just a few small interesting products on the tray and a little smile on the face to make the nearby small shop your favourite spot to visit regularly!

Depending on the weather conditions, it may be just a tiny ice cream set or a refreshing and chilled drink after the jogging and training session at the playground across the street!

Hopefully, we will enjoy the fantastic company and positive energy of all the residents staying in the area and sharing small moments of happiness together for many years to come!

Seems like this LIM ONG Mart was taken over by new owner named 303 recently that open earlier and closes later than the previous owner. Is a minimart that  sell the daily essentials needs. Enjoy going there without having to walk far. People there are friendly approachable and helpful so will always get my stuff there and also a Shopee collection point
